long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FaceBreak breaks notifications on Facebook, including those you cannot otherwise turn off, so you can take back control of your social media. When a notification is received, it is detected, and all of your notifications are marked as read. It also blocks the notification pop-up box and the new comment pop-up boxes on Facebook.
